Moving

A post shared by Hanief (@haniefcahya) on Apr 5, 2017 at 11:30pm PDT

Some personal news. Starting April, I am moving to Nottingham, UK. My wife got a scholarship at University of Nottingham to pursue a Ph.D in BioSciences.

I am looking forward to learn all about Robin Hood. :)
